# Runme Examples

This `README.md` contains some example for testing this extension.

# Extension Example Markdown Files

This markdown file contains some custom examples to test the execution within a VS Code Notebook.

## Shell Executions

```sh
echo "Hello World"
```


## Stdin Example

```sh

```
